name: Metal Agency
description:
Metal is a fully integrated digital agency specializing in real estate, motorsport, finance, oil and energy, retail, entertainment, media, and hospitality industries.Â 
Metal Agency is headquartered in The Woodlands, Texas with an office in Tampa, Florida. Metal works with a diverse roster of global clientele providing strategy, technology, design and managed services with a proven track record of success for every screen in the digital age.
